error_bad_recipient: You cannot award OP a %s as the moderators feel that allowing so would corrupt the %s system. If you were trying to show the OP how to award a %s please do so by clicking [here](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose/?to=%s&subject=remind&message=%s) and then clicking 'send'.
error_length: This %s is currently disallowed as your comment doesn't include enough text ([comment rule 4](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/rules#wiki_rule_4)). Please add an explanation for how /u/%s changed your view. Responding to this comment will cause me to recheck your %s comment.
error_submission_history: You have already awarded /u/%s a %s in this comment tree.
congrats_first_body:
Congratulations! You've earned your first %s!

As you may already know, a %s (∆) is given when a comment has changed someone's view. For a more detailed explanation of the %s system, [see here](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/%s).

/u/%s has updated your user flair and created [your own wiki page](/r/%s/wiki/user/%s) which will be updated every time you earn a %s. If you do well, you may find yourself on our [leaderboards](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/leaderboards) (the monthly one is also featured in our sidebar).

Good luck, and happy CMVing!

_____

*[^I ^am ^a ^bot](https://github.com/alexames/%s)^, ^and ^this ^action ^was ^performed ^automatically. ^Please [^contact ^the ^moderators ^of ^CMV](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=/r/changemyview) ^if ^you ^have ^any ^further ^questions ^or ^concerns.*
remind:
To award a %s, the following criteria must be met:

1. A valid %s symbol (mobile users: type !%s) must appear somewhere in the message.

2. The comment must be at least %s long.

3. The %s cannot be awarded to the redditor that submitted this CMV topic.
remove_low_effort: Your comment was removed as it contains a %s but does not explain why your view was changed.
remove_remind: Your comment was removed as it appears you were trying to show someone how to use the %s system. Please use the [remind feature](/message/compose/?to=%s&subject=remind) instead. Simply include the permalink (no context please!) in the message section.
remove_abuse: Your comment was removed for abusing the %s system.
stop_body:
%s has been issued a STOP command and is shutting down. Command issued by %s.

Reason: %s ∆
